price: 36. Nabii Qiisa isi marak: diggah Yallay sin fan как seeca usuk yi- Rabbiiy sin Rabbik, toysa dibuk kaa uqbuda usuk agleyta malik, tamah massa-le gitay mako sinni kinnik keenik iyye.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna al-laha rabbī warabbukum fa-uʿ'budūhu hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
